item.title: Algorithms
item.description: Algorithms I took both undergrad- and Ph.D.-level algorithms courses at NTU. The attachments below are part of my solutions to correspond assignments for the undergrad-level class. Both classesâ€™ remaining coursework and lecture notes will be organized and uploaded sooner. Assignment 3 Assignment 4 Assignment 5

item.title: East Asian Confucianisms: Humanism
item.description: East Asian Confucianisms: Humanism This course explores the core values and development of East Asian Confucian cultural traditions from a modern perspective and analyzes its modern implications. Additionally, this course examines the humanistic spirit of East Asian Confucianism, including the life wisdom of Confucius, Mencius, Zhuzi, Japanese and Korean Confucians, and the life wisdom of Taoism and Buddhism as a Confucian contrasting and interactive system. Here is my term project (written in Chinese).

item.title: Information Economics
item.description: Information Economics This course was taught by Prof. Ling-Chieh Kung. Here is my term project.
